about_the_game:
These are the sounds of the Dungeons of Blood and Dream. Inspired by modern Dungeon Synth and Keller Synth, these meandering and hallucinogenic songs will transport you into the Dream, the infinite realm within your own mind where anything is possible, as long as you remember who you are.

Composed by Lori Vornoy.

This package contains 24 tracks in MP3 and WAV formats. It will be updated with new files whenever new music gets added to the game.
